column5: Management (Media) Course OverviewOur MSc Management (Media) programme is an attractive specialism if you are interested in the challenges associated with global media and would like to develop a career within this field.You will pursue specialist topics such as public relations, branding, promotion and digital media, equipping you with knowledge in the key areas fundamental to the development, design and promotion of media platforms and the content that they host. You will also develop your skills in essential business and management concepts such as managing financial resources, operations, human resources and marketing.
